ARABIC: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I am only a warner. There is no god except Allah, the One, the All-Conquering,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "I am only a warner, and there is no other god but God, the one, the omnipotent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Tell them, (O Prophet): “I am nothing but a warner. There is no deity but Allah, the One, the Supreme,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad) say, "I am only a warner. The only Lord is God, the Almighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I am purely a Herald of Warning – and there is no God except Allah, the One, the All Dominant.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "I am only a warner and there is no God (worthy of worship) except Allah the One, the Irresistible,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I am only a warner, and there is no god but Allah, the One, the Subduer (of all):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'I am only a warner. There is not any god but God, the One, the Omnipotent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): I am only a warner, and there is no Allah save Allah, the One, the Absolute,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, [Prophet], "I am only a warner. There is no god but God, the One, the All-Powerful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: I am but warner, and there is no god but Allah, the One, the Subduer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I am just a warner, and there is no god except Allah, the One, the All-paramount,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "Truly am I a Warner: no god is there but the one Allah, Supreme and Irresistible,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "I am only a warner and there is no Ilah (God) except Allah (none has the right to be worshipped but Allah) the One, the Irresistible,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'I am only a warner. There is no god except Allah, the One, the Conqueror,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “I am only a warner, and there is no god except God—the One, the Conqueror.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:65] Say, O Muhammad (s), to the disbelievers of Mecca: ‘I am only a warner, to threaten [disbelievers] with [punishment in] the Fire. And there is no god except God, the One, the All-Compelling, of [all] His creatures;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to the people of Mecca, Muhammad: (I am only a warner) a warning messenger, (and there is no God save Allah) He has no son or partner, (the One, the Absolute) Superior over His creation,
